about_the_game:
A delivery from Russia

Gage just a got a delivery from a foreign contact - a container full of russian weapons. These guns won’t break due to a speck of dust or some drops of water. They‘ll withstand a nuclear blast and will never jam. They are built to get the job done.

The Gage Russian Weapon Pack includes 3 Weapons, 1 Melee Weapon, 4 Masks, 4 Materials, 4 Patterns and 4 Achievements.

Key Features


Sniper Rifle - Grom Sniper Rifle – Semi-automatic sniper rifle with high accuracy. The Grom Sniper Rifle is swift and easy to handle, without being too heavy.

Comes with the following mods:
  • Iron Sight
  • Lightweight Stock
  • Lightweight Foregrip
  • Grievky Compensator
  • Tikho Silencer


SMG - Tatonka SMG – The Tatonka is perfect for all CQC combat and holds a high capacity magazine. Easy to use and with a high rate of fire.



Assault Rifle - AK17 – The AK17 is reliable and accurate and comes with several mods so that you can adjust it to your liking. Fits both mid to close-distance combat.


Rezkoye Tactical Knife – Groundbreaking design creates a trusty melee weapon. Its serrated top makes sure to cause maximum damage even though it’s rather small in size.



• Four new masks


• Four new patterns


• Four new materials


• 4 new achievements to unlock

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *:Windows 7
  • Processor:2 GHz Intel Dual Core Processor
  • Memory:4 GB RAM
  • Graphics:Nvidia & AMD (512MB VRAM)
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Hard Drive:31 GB HD space
  • Sound:DirectX 9.0c compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS:Windows 10
  • Processor:2.3 GHz Intel Quad Core Processor
  • Memory:8 GB RAM
  • Graphics:Nvidia & AMD (1GB VRAM)
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Hard Drive:45 GB HD space
  • Sound:DirectX 9.0c compatible
